fullText: Jessica Chastain delivers a powerhouse performance as Nora Helmer in Jamie Lloyd's striking revival of Henrik Ibsen's 'A Doll's House,' which transforms the classic into a riveting contemporary thriller.
dtliExcerpt: Jessica Chastain delivers a powerhouse performance as Nora Helmer in Jamie Lloyd's striking revival of Henrik Ibsen's 'A Doll's House,' which transforms the classic into a riveting contemporary thriller.
